Posts.Content: Snowflake67 wrote: Learning new things daily since being diagnosed on sept 12 2016. Report says well differentiated invasive ductal carcinoma and foci of low grade ductal carcinoma in situ. Solid and cribriform types. So what does this mean? Mass is very small- 1 cm. Historical grade is 1, nuclear is 2, mitotic is 1, Richardson score is 4. Lumpectomy is 9/29/16 and my oncology appt is 10/14/16. Dx 9/12/2016, DCIS/IDC, Right, <1cm, Stage IB, Grade 1, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 9/29/2016 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Log in to post a reply
